MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK5 postcode area of Larbert, affecting properties in Burnhead Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.20pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.57pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020
